string.text: Chance to keep outfit on death
When "Allow Outfit Loss" is enabled, this slider sets the chance that your outfit will stay with you when you respawn. 0 = always lose, 1 = always keep.
Chance to keep headgear on death
When "Allow Headgear Loss" is enabled, this slider sets the chance that your headgear will stay with you when you respawn. 0 = always lose, 1 = always keep.
Chance to keep weapon on death
When "Allow Weapon Loss" is enabled, this slider sets the chance that your weapon will stay with you when you respawn. 0 = always lose, 1 = always keep.
Chance to keep artifact on death
When "Allow Artifact Loss" is enabled, this slider sets the chance that your artifact will stay with you when you respawn. 0 = always lose, 1 = always keep.
